name: Honey Garlic Chicken & Rice
description: Sweet and savory caramelized chicken in honey garlic sauce. A perfectly balanced main dish served with rice.

instructions.instruction: Rinse rice and cook with 2 cups water for 15 minutes.
Make sauce: Mix honey, soy sauce, chicken broth, and cornstarch.
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add chicken pieces. Brown all sides for 2-3 minutes each.
instructions.tip: Arrange in single layer, don't stack.

instructions.instruction: Add minced garlic, stir for 30 seconds. Watch it doesn't burn.
Pour sauce over chicken. Stir until it boils.
When sauce thickens and coats the chicken, reduce heat. Cook 2-3 more minutes.
Steam or blanch broccoli separately for 3-4 minutes. Keep it crisp.
Plate rice, top with honey garlic chicken and broccoli.
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onion.

tips: Honey is a natural energy source, ideal before workouts.
Add garlic after chicken to prevent burning.
Great for meal prep - keeps well for 4 days.
storageInfo: Store in airtight container for up to 4 days. Add water when reheating.
servingSuggestion: Serve with steamed vegetables. Eat 2 hours before training.
variations: Add red pepper flakes for a spicy version.
Use quinoa instead of rice for more protein.
